compatibility.notes: The SCEA license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without significant restrictions. Care should be taken when integrating with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include copyright notice when distributing the Software.
Do not impair ownership rights of SCEA or contributors.
license.name: SCEA
obligations: You must not file for any patent application or seek copyright protection that might impair ownership rights in the Software.
If you contribute modifications to the Software, you do so voluntarily and grant SCEA the right to use, modify, or distribute those contributions.
